document.full_text: a united nations program on wednesday cited progress in modernizing payroll systems for afghanistan's police, pushing back against questions about u.n. oversight that were raised by a u.s. audit.
document.title: u.n. cites progress after afghan police pay audit
lines_and_colors: a united nations program on wednesday cited progress in modernizing payroll systems for afghanistan's police, pushing back against questions about u.n. oversight that were raised by a u.s. audit.
